faq1_title: How can I create a mapstory?
faq1_texta: a.) You can sign up and create your own story.
faq1_textb: b.) You can view finished mapstories in the gallery and get inspired by the themes.
faq2_title: What can I use Mapstories for?
faq2_texta: Actually, for everything. You can use Mapstories especially well for stories that are set in different places (in the world) and where the places are somehow connected. These are mainly supply chains, migration routes, and global interconnections.
faq2_lista: What are stations of your school or work journey?
faq2_listb: Where exactly does the wood in my chair come from?
faq2_listc: Where does my t-shirt and the individual parts (yarn, colors, etc.) come from and how do the local people live?
faq2_listd: Where does the orange juice come from and how do the pickers:inside live and how is the environment there?
faq2_listf: Where did my grandparents move to Germany from back then and what are the places and stories in between?
Where do other activist:ins actually live in the world?

faq4_title: In which browser does Mapstories work?
faq4_text: Mapstories works in all major browsers. It is completely web-based, so no installation is necessary.

faq8_title: Can I save my map story?
faq8_text: Your mapstory is automatically saved to your account. So you can access and edit it as soon as you log in.
